articles.title: A cool time to assess the trees around a home
articles.description:
Whether you are a first-time buyer or an experienced house hunter, here are a few things to look for in the garden as well as some red flags to avoid.

The post A cool time to assess the trees around a home appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Assess trees during fall for potential hazards and maintenance needs.
Look for signs of disease or damage in trees around homes.
Healthy trees can increase property value and enhance neighborhood aesthetics.

articles.title: Get fired up about adding a feature to your home
articles.description:
Whether it’s for heat or aesthetics, here are the steps to take to install a gas, electric, or wood-burning fireplace.

The post Get fired up about adding a feature to your home appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore options for installing fireplaces in Boston homes for heat and aesthetics.
Choose between gas, electric, or wood-burning fireplaces based on personal preference.
Enhancing home features can increase property value and comfort for Boston residents.

articles.title: A Newburyport teen’s body was unidentified for 33 years. Now, his aunt and a cold-case aficionado want to bring him home.
articles.description:
"Anthony is going to be placed in the same place as his mom and my father and my mother and his brother, and I feel complete with knowing that.”

The post A Newburyport teen’s body was unidentified for 33 years. Now, his aunt and a cold-case aficionado want to bring him home. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Newburyport teen's body identified after 33 years, reuniting him with family.
His aunt plans to bury him alongside relatives, providing closure.
Local cold-case advocate played a crucial role in solving this long-standing mystery.

articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
What do Hasbro, Aroldis Chapman, Arthur T. Demoulas, and Matt Damon and Ben Affleck have in common? They’re all in this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston residents can test their knowledge with a local news quiz this week.
Quiz features notable figures like Aroldis Chapman and Matt Damon.
Engagement with local news helps strengthen community awareness and connection.
